mapper.sql: T.ID, T.FUNC_ID, T.PERMISSION_ID, T.IS_ACTIVE, T.CREATED_BY, T.CREATE_TIME, T.UPDATED_BY, T.UPDATE_TIME, T.REC_VER, T.TAG_SEQ
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PLMS_FUNC_PERM T inner join PLMS_PERMISSION T2 on T.PERMISSION_ID = T2.ID
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.delete: delete from PLMS_FUNC_PERM T where T.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_plms_func_perm.nextval FROM dual
insert into PLMS_FUNC_PERM T () values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{funcId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isActive,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recVer,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

mapper.update:
update PLMS_FUNC_PERM T
T.ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
T.FUNC_ID = #{record.funcId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
T.PERMISSION_ID = #{record.permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
T.IS_ACTIVE = #{record.isActive,jdbcType=CHAR},
T.CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
T.UPDATED_BY = #{record.updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
T.REC_VER = #{record.recVer,jdbcType=BIGINT},
T.TAG_SEQ = #{record.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update PLMS_FUNC_PERM T set T.ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, T.FUNC_ID = #{record.funcId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, T.PERMISSION_ID = #{record.permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, T.IS_ACTIVE = #{record.isActive,jdbcType=CHAR}, T.CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, T.UPDATED_BY = #{record.updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, T.REC_VER = #{record.recVer,jdbcType=BIGINT}, T.TAG_SEQ = #{record.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update PLMS_FUNC_PERM T
T.FUNC_ID = #{funcId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
T.PERMISSION_ID = #{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
T.IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive,jdbcType=CHAR},
T.CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
T.UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
T.UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
T.REC_VER = #{recVer,jdbcType=BIGINT} + 1,
T.TAG_SEQ = #{tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where T.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and T.REC_VER = #{recVer,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update PLMS_FUNC_PERM T set T.FUNC_ID = #{funcId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, T.PERMISSION_ID = #{permissionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, T.IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive,jdbcType=CHAR}, T.CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, T.UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, T.REC_VER = #{recVer,jdbcType=BIGINT}, T.TAG_SEQ = #{tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT} where T.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
